message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm holding out for something closer to $18,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand the product has value, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $18,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $16,000?
